name: jingo
content:
by jingo
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express surprise or to emphasize a statement: By jingo, we're losing speed. By jingo, they've done a tip-top job. He plans to discover the truth, by jingo.
More examplesFewer examplesThey can throw me in jail, but by jingo, I will not give up!By jingo, he's right!We don't want to fight but, by jingo, if we do, we've got the men.
